Package com.Game.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.Game.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Main controller class that coordinates the game flow. This class manages the game state, delegates to specialized controllers, and handles transitions between different game phases. In the State pattern, this class serves as the Context.

    • handleTournamentCommand

      public boolean handleTournamentCommand(String[] p_commandParts)
      Handles the tournament command.
      Parameters:
      p_commandParts - The parts of the tournament command
      Returns:
      true if tournament was successfully started, false otherwise

    • setPhase

      public void setPhase(PhaseType p_phaseType)
      Sets the current phase of the game to the specified PhaseType. This method manages the game phase transitions, ensuring that phase changes are not nested (to prevent recursion). It logs the action of changing phases if a logger is provided, and updates the game state accordingly. The method handles four predefined phases: PhaseType.MAP_EDITOR, PhaseType.STARTUP, PhaseType.ISSUE_ORDER, and PhaseType.ORDER_EXECUTION. If an invalid phase is provided, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      p_phaseType - The PhaseType representing the new phase to set.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided p_phaseType is not valid.

    • getCurrentState

      public Phase getCurrentState()
      Gets the current phase state.
      Returns:
      The current phase state

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game and processes user commands. Provides a command prompt that's available throughout the game.

    • handleGamePlayer

      public void handleGamePlayer(String p_action, String p_playerName, String p_playerType)
      Handles the gameplayer command to add or remove players.
      Parameters:
      p_action - The action to perform (add/remove)
      p_playerName - The name of the player to add/remove
      p_playerType - The type of player to add (human, aggressive, benevolent, random, cheater)

    • handleGamePlayer

      public void handleGamePlayer(String p_action, String p_playerName)
      Handles the gameplayer command with default player type (human).
      Parameters:
      p_action - The action to perform (add/remove)
      p_playerName - The name of the player to add/remove
